explains: adj. 公正的，不偏不倚的

sentences.en: This newspaper has achieved a reputation for honest and impartial political reporting.
sentences.cn: 这家报纸凭诚实公正的政治报道赢得了声誉。

sentences.en: As chairman, I must remain impartial.
sentences.cn: 作为主席，我必须保持中立。

sentences.en: It can help to have an impartial third party look over your work.
sentences.cn: 让中立的第3方来检查你的工作会有所帮助。
